text: Hi folks! I have 3000 blog articles to transfer from Wordpress to a custom made Blog Post Template in HubSpot. Does anyone know a way, a script for instance, to transfer blog content from Wordpress to HubSpot? I have given this one a try: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/blog/import-your-wordpress-blog-into-HubSpot> , but the content wont display in my blog post (only metadata) - possibly because the Wordpress blog is also custom made and does not include main content in the post body.

My bad, the blog content was actually imported with the `{{content.post_body}}` ! But if any one has a script to put the content in different fields - or anything to help with the import - it would still be a lot of help:)

Hi <@U019MHV2JAY> you may need HubSpot support to change the content of that other variable to the standard one. Because lets say you build a template that is able to access that variable? what will happen when you create new blog posts using the editor?
